thread.title: Customer Malcolm Hudson
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer Malcolm Hudson

author: Customer Malcolm Hudson
title: Customer Malcolm Hudson
text: The two guys who turned up to fix my tyre did an excellent job and in a very short time they even put my spare back into the well in my boot and checked all my tyre pressures they certainly get a 10 from me
